english.segment1: Give me one more chance tonight. to keep you waiting for nothing. And make you stay here in this place. Where you are only what they say you are
english.segment2: You can save the lie, we are the ones. who've seen the other side. Say our own good byes, leaving the world and all our cares behind
english.segment3: Give me one more chance today to keep you sitting in one place. Riding on the fence you've made, you're only partly dying this way
english.segment4: Am I keeping you from life? or am I keeping you alive?
